attributes.action: Take action for the innocent people in Syria
attributes.background: We can't watch another chemical attack on innocent children in Syria and do nothing. Their suffering is beyond belief. We have a voice.  The recent attack on Idlib shows that this war has no control...we need to do something.

rejection.details:
It is unclear what action you wish the Government to take. You may wish to sign one of the following existing petitions on Syria:

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/174614

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/169466

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/194421
